name: Abel William
appearance: A bearded man with a square face and darker complexion than most white men. He keeps a thick beard that appears carefully groomed.
personality: Anxious, overworked, and frustrated. He tries to stay professional but is clearly under pressure from economic decline and unexplained events.
background: After his father Peter William died, Abel inherited the family distillery in Cassandra. He manages the business alone, but declining economic conditions forced him to shut down part of the factory and lay off many workers, leaving much of the facility unused.
goals: Understand the strange events plaguing his workplace
secrets: The spider infestation and his own death are connected to unnatural forces
He was already dead earlier than it appeared to investigators

inventory.name: Scrapbook clippings (incl. father's obituary + loose 1988 newspaper clipping)

properties.clue: Obituary + a loose 1988-era clipping about a riot, hinting at Simon's past.
Reports unusual Pacific fish activity + shark attacks/beach controls; foreshadows Cassandra anomalies tied to Deep Ones activity.
